cells.data:
-- zip4 :: [a] -> [b] -> [c] -> [d] -> [(a, b, c, d)]
on zip4(ws, xs, ys, zs)
    script
        on |λ|(w, i)
            Tuple4(w, item i of xs, item i of ys, item i of zs)
        end |λ|
    end script
    map(result, items 1 thru ¬
        minimum({length of xs, length of ys, length of zs}) of xs)
end zip4
